component_structure.description: Ensures components follow the project structure
rules: All components must have a corresponding interface for props
Props interfaces should be named with the component name followed by 'Props'
All components should be exported as default
Components should be placed in the appropriate feature directory
Ensure all JSX elements have appropriate accessibility attributes
Avoid inline styles in favor of Tailwind classes

configuration_management.description: Ensures configuration files use the correct format
rules: Use .js files for configuration when the underlying tools expect JavaScript
Use CommonJS module.exports for Next.js configuration
Keep configuration files in the root directory
Avoid using any type in tests
Use proper mocking techniques for external dependencies

type_safety.description: Ensures type safety across the codebase
rules: Define explicit return types for functions

pre_build_checks: Run npm run lint before building
Run npm run type-check before building
Run npm run test before building
Ensure all components referenced in code are implemented
